comment.author: 26375439@N03
comment._content:
Hard to tell, but I think this is a 'fake' fossil.  Even though all the 'bones' are numbered, none of them seem to conform to any bones I've ever seen and the whole thing appears to have been carved from a single block!

Unless it's someone's attempt to copy a genuine fossil assemblage, perhaps to illustrate the paleontologist's difficult job of reconstructing a skeleton from a rock sample, I think the Smithsonian's been had!
